basic.name: Arcane Rift (Q)
basic.description: Launch a rift that deals 170 damage to enemies in its path. If an enemy Hero is hit, reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund 50 Mana.Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Arcane Rift without dying.Reward: Permanently increase the damage dealt by 75 and cooldown reduction for hitting a Hero by 1 second.

basic.name: Force of Will (W)
basic.description: Protect an allied Hero from all damage for 1.5 seconds.  Upon expiration, Force of Will heals the target for 20% of the damage it absorbed.

basic.name: Portal (E)
basic.description: Create a set of portals between Medivh and the target location, allowing allies to teleport between both. The portals last 6 seconds.

heroic.name: Poly Bomb (R)
heroic.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

heroic.name: Ley Line Seal (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

trait.name: Raven Form (T)
trait.description: Instead of mounting, Medivh can transform into a raven, increasing Movement Speed by 20%. While transformed, Medivh can see and fly over all terrain and is immune to all effects.

1.name: Winds of Celerity
1.description: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

1.name: Raven’s Intellect
1.description: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

1.name: Portal Mastery
1.description: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form. Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

4.name: Mage Armor
4.description: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 40 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 40%.

4.name: Raven Familiar
4.description: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Dust of Appearance
4.description: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

7.name: Mystic Assault
7.description: If Arcane Rift hits an enemy Hero, Medivh's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 50% more damage and heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Arcane Explosion
7.description: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 additional damage.

7.name: Force of Magic
7.description: Preventing at least 268 damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

10.name: Poly Bomb
10.description: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Ley Line Seal
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

13.name: Circle of Protection
13.description: Force of Will also applies to allies near the target, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Enduring Will
13.description: Preventing at least 268 damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

13.name: Reabsorption
13.description: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

16.name: Arcane Charge
16.description: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

16.name: Temporal Flux
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3%. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by -9%.

16.name: Stable Portal
16.description: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

20.name: Glyph Of Poly Bomb
20.description: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

20.name: Medivh Cheats!
20.description: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

20.name: Guardian of Tirisfal
20.description: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

20.name: Arcane Brilliance
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

20.name: Dust of Disappearance
20.description: Stealth an allied Hero for 40 seconds, they are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.Stores up to 2 charges.
